_header: The old dog the old dog
_description: Fragment of a song about the old dog — 6 unrhymed lines, with musical notation, including refrain, ‘a buffa trola trol’

BLAdd60577.Transcription:
The old dog þe old dogAs he lay in his dena buffa trol a
                    trolAs he lay in his dena buffa trol a trolas he lay in his
                    den
